description: Kids love it and I feel comfortable with them browsing...Thank you!
Extremly safe and intuitive. Highly recommended.

I do not like the titles the "star ratings" have. I wouldn't say I hate this browser, I didn't even get a chance to try it. Opened it up in Ubuntu Focal, registered my account with a Microsoft Email it took the credentials then went "blank". Tried several more time to open it, but it just hung on a black screen.

Was really excited to check it out based on the concept and write up in the description. Maybe will try again in the future, but have to remove it for now; (hmmm, where does all that lost space data. like my email sign up, go?).
doesnt work and every loading takes forever to finally load a black screen boring
